original: 潁川潁陽人，漢末史家、儒者。漢獻帝命荀悅仿左傳體例，刪略《漢書》，編撰而成《漢紀》。時人讚譽《漢紀》「辭約事詳，論辨多美」、「省約易習，有便於用」。
text: Yingyang, Yingchuan, historian and Confucian at the end of Han Dynasty. Emperor Xian of the Han Dynasty ordered Xun Yue to imitate Zuo Zhuan's style, abbreviated "Han Shu", and compiled "Han Ji". People at the time praised the "Han Ji" for "explanatory details, beautiful argumentation", "saving appointments, easy learning, easy to use".
